changeSet.author: irina
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `user_account` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `login` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `modify_data` timestamp(6) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

changeSet.author: irina
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `employee` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `access_code` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `salary` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `position` varchar(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

changeSet.author: irina
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `user` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `first_name` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `last_name` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `phone` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `birthday` date DEFAULT NULL, `sex` varchar(5) NOT NULL, `address` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `login_UNIQUE` (`first_name`), CONSTRAINT `employee_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `employee` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `user_account_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `user_account` (`id`) )

changeSet.author: irina
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `friend` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `use_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `friend_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `friend_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`friend_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `user_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`use_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`) )

changeSet.author: irina
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `company` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `address` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

changeSet.author: irina
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `company_employee` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `company_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `employee_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `company_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`company_id`) REFERENCES `company` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_employee` FOREIGN KEY (`employee_id`) REFERENCES `employee` (`id`) )
